mapper.insert: insert into recipe.recipe(recipe_id, title, introduction, ingredients, method, create_time, time_duration, user_id) values (#{recipeId}, #{title}, #{introduction}, #{ingredients}, #{method}, #{createTime}, #{timeDuration}, #{userId})

insert into recipe.photo(recipe_id, file_name) values
(#{recipeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select r.recipe_id, r.title, r.introduction, r.ingredients, r.method, r.create_time, r.time_duration, r.user_id, r.is_privacy from recipe.recipe r where recipe_id = #{recipeId}

select r.recipe_id, r.title, r.introduction, r.ingredients, r.method, r.create_time, r.time_duration, r.user_id, r.is_privacy, count(1) likes from recipe.recipe r left join recipe.like l on r.recipe_id = l.recipe_id where r.user_id = #{userId} group by r.recipe_id;
